sentences.en: Aeration from the bottom of the bin fluidizes the charge.
sentences.cn: 从料箱的底部吹入空气使物料流化.

sentences.en: But you know how it is with us human you take something good you dissect it scrutinise it time and again not believing your good fortune and finally cast it to the "no" bin.
sentences.cn: 可是你知道的，对我们人类来说，你以为某件事物很好、你仔细分析它、细看它一次又一次，不相信你的好运，最后又把它丢到「不」的箱子里（不再理它），这真是很消极又愚蠢的。

sentences.en: Difficulties in allocating surge bin logistics system reliability analysis are analyzed.
sentences.cn: 分析了增设缓冲仓物流系统可靠性分析的难点.

sentences.en: Do you need to keep these letters or shall we bin them?
sentences.cn: 你需要保存这些信件吗，还是干脆把它们扔掉？

sentences.en: He decided to bin his paintings.
He emptied several bags of rice into a bin.
sentences.cn: 他把几袋米倒进大箱里.

sentences.en: HEX file format conversion tool for BIN file format of the source code.
sentences.cn: HEX文件 格式转换成BIN文件格式的工具的源代码.

sentences.en: Ich will Kobolde um mich haben , denn ich bin mutig.
sentences.cn: 我欲召山灵来我身旁,因为我甚勇往.

sentences.en: It is important that a grain distributor be used in filling the bin.
sentences.cn: 在装仓时采用谷物匀布器是很重要的.

sentences.en: It was pointed out that BIN method is under a hypothesis that frequency is normally distributed.
sentences.cn: 提出bin方法是在假设频数分布为正态性的前提下使用的.

sentences.en: Put your rubbish in the bin.
The applicant sought judicial review to quash the bin - dover order.
sentences.cn: 申请人请求司法审理以便废除责令某人守法的命令.

sentences.en: The baker emptied several bags of flour into a bin.
sentences.cn: 面包师把几袋面粉倒入贮藏箱里.

sentences.en: The machine sliced of thin rounds of copper into a bin.
sentences.cn: 这台机器将薄圆铜片切进箱子里.

sentences.en: The sole reason the Recycle Bin exists is to implement an undo facility for deleted files.
sentences.cn: 回收站存在的唯一理由就是实现文件删除的撤销工具.

sentences.en: The weigh belt will turn on bin shaker to start the material moving again.
sentences.cn: 带秤将开动料箱的振动器,以使物料继续流动.

words.tran_cn: [数] 二进制的；二元的，二态的
把…扔进垃圾箱；装箱（bin的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 锅顶仓，吊挂箱；舱顶行李箱
贮仓，储料仓；缓冲仓；平衡料仓

trans.tran_en: a large container for storing things, such as goods in a shop or substances in a factory
